<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Analysis Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/style-transfer/status/{thread_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get status of style analysis and image generation by thread_id.

Poll this endpoint until status is 'complete' or 'error'.
After calling /generate, also check `generation_status` for image results.

Recommended polling interval: 2-3 seconds.

Fields:
    - status: Analysis status (processing|complete|error|timeout)
    - generation_status: Image generation status (generating|complete|error|timeout)
    - generated_images: List of generated images (when generation_status=complete)
